rows.label: tlk502106_msg0001
rows.name:
That's a nice blade you have with you
there.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0002
rows.name: Are you referring to me by any chance?

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0003
rows.name: Yes! May I ask your name?

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0004
rows.name: I'm Hotaru.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0005
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]...This could be my chance...

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0011
rows.name: Hotaru... That's a really nice name!

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0012
rows.name:
You look as if your gentle heart is
matched with boundless talent. You
look really classy...and cute.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0013
rows.name: Ahaha... Oh...if you say so...

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0014
rows.name:
I'd be really made up if a Blade like
you was serving the Empire.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0015
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Oh...stop!

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0021
rows.name:
Ah, it sounds great, but I already have a
Driver...and some responsibilities.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0022
rows.name: Not a problem.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0023
rows.name:
I'd trade you for ten of the finest
Superbian soldiers.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0024
rows.name:
We'd pay you half a million gold per
year, and you'd get living expenses on
top of that.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0025
rows.name:
We'd give you one of House Horrison's
ancestral treasures as a
contract-signing fee, too.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0026
rows.name:
Well, I have to agree it's an incredibly
tempting offer...

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0027
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Nearly got him...

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0031
rows.name:
I'm a little perturbed by the lack of
greenery in Superbia though.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0032
rows.name:
I really need to be around trees and
plants, you see.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0033
rows.name: Huh? Really?

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0034
rows.name:
I guess...Superbia's Divine Beast is coming to
the end of its life. We don't have the
technology to slow that down, sadly...

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0035
rows.name:
Huh? Well, why don't you try and come
up with a plan to fix the problem? Then
I might reconsider your offer.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0036
rows.name:
Understood. Well, I'll let you have
House Horrison's treasure, anyhow.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0037
rows.name:
I hope this will help you to remember
your promise to reconsider my offer.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0038
rows.name:
It's okay! I'm sure it's not the sort of
thing I'd be able to forget.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0039
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Huh?
Yeah!

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0051
rows.name: Ah, just forget what I said then.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0052
rows.name:
Thinking about it a bit more, I'm not
sure I've got the authority to make that
kind of decision.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0053
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Huh?
That's odd...

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0054
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Perhaps my charm failed me this time.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0061
rows.name:
Hey, wait a moment!
Please...just forget what I said earlier.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0062
rows.name:
I mean, now I think of it...I can't really
just go giving away House Horrison's
treasure to a Blade like that.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0063
rows.name: Sorry, the deal's off.

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0064
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Huh?
That's odd...

rows.label: tlk502106_msg0065
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]Perhaps my charm failed me this time.
